==Translingual==

===Etymology===
[[石]] (stone; equal to Korean [[돌]](''dol'')) + [[乙]] (used as marker to represent the last consonant [[ㄹ]], because of their similarity in shape). One of the ''[[음역자|eumyeokja]]'' ("character for transliteration") used in the {{w|Idu script}} for Korean 돌.

===Han character===
{{Han char|rn=5|rad=乙|as=05|sn=6|four=10717|canj=MRN|ids=⿱石乙}}

# [[rock]]
# used in [[Korean]] [[name]]s
